DataElement.preferredName: Past Year Patient Health Problem Information Comments Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe a patient's health problems over the past calendar year.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past Year Patient Health Problem Information
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The state of the organism when it functions optimally without evidence of disease._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The state of the organism when it functions optimally without evidence of disease.:A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

Property.preferredDefinition: Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

Concepts.definition: Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field for general notes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
